articles.description:
Did you know that these countries are #crypto friendly?
It means that these countries' governments are actively working on determining the legal status of cryptocurrency
🇵🇹 Portugal
🇨🇭 Switzerland
🇩🇪 Germany
🇸🇬 Singapore
🇲🇹 Malta
Comment down where you’d move to 👇

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 5/ Scalara announces March rebalancing results for the DeFi Pulse Index.
Scalara: Scalara announces the results of the March 2022 rebalance of the DeFi Pulse Index ($DPI).
Monthly top performers were 3 constituents that have been index members since inception:
- @KyberNetwork KNC +79%
- @loopringorg LRC +61%
- @synthetix_io SNX +46%
 https://www.scalara.xyz/blog/march-2022-rebalance-defi-pulse-index
articles.title: Re 5/ Scalara announces March rebalancing results for the DeFi Pulse Index.
